text: Chicago Cubs, Cristiano Ronaldo, Kevin Durant, Michael Phelps, Roger Federer, Serena Williams, Simone Biles, and Tom Brady are all among nominees for The 25th ESPYS on ABC, hosted by Peyton Manning WHAT : Nominees for The 25th ESPYS were revealed today and fan voting has begun. WHERE : Fans can cast their vote at ESPYS. com and a list of The 25th ESPYS nominees is available to members of the media at : http : / / bit. ly / 2017ESPYnom. WHEN : Voting is underway and all categories will close when the live show starts on Wednesday, July 12, at 8 p. m. ET. Pardon the Interruption â€™ s Tony Korn
